query_sql: SELECT t.name, t.phone, t.address, t.birthday, t.lucky_number, t.update_user, t.update_dt FROM User t
insert_sql: INSERT INTO User (name, phone, address, birthday, lucky_number, update_user, update_dt) VALUES (:name, :phone, :address, :birthday, :lucky_number, :update_user, now())
update_sql: UPDATE User SET address=:address, lucky_number=:lucky_number, update_user update_dt=now() where name=:name and phone=:phone and birthday=:birthday
delete_sql: DELETE FROM User where name=:name and phone=:phone and birthday=:birthday
